history.proof: intros. unfold Z_Zp in x, y. scongruence use: Zp_opp_inv unfold: Z_Zp.

exceptions.exn: The reference Zp_equivalence was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. unfold Z_Zp in x, y. unfold Z_Zp in Hp. unfold Zp_equivalence in x, y. intros H. apply Z_Zp_eq. apply Z_Zp_eq. rewrite Z_Zp_val. rewrite Z_Zp_val. apply P3. rewrite Z_Zp_val in H. rewrite Z_Zp_val in H. apply H.
